Weapon.name: Queens Blade
Weapon.description: In the old time, Queen uses this blade to protect her people.

Weapon.name: Flame of Alabus
Weapon.description: Since Tilia has fallen, Alabus's anger has only made this fire burns even brighter.

Weapon.name: Edinear's Tears
Weapon.description: Edinear was the mother of all. Her tear purify all unholiness.

Weapon.name: Shield of Tilia
Weapon.description: A giant shield Standing in front of Tilia, no one could ever pick up.
